casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Matthew Allen HALL-DAVIS Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 14, 2017

Pamela S. Nagy, assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Nancy L. Chupak, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 177 Conn. App. 211, 172 A.3d 222 (2017), is denied.
